About Us

Meet the team behind the company.

About SportKeeper

We are a newer company, and as such, we are constantly working to prove that we are the best of the best. We believe that current system is already a notch above that of our competitors, but that doesn’t mean we’re finished. We plan to continue to improve our product and help tailor it to your needs for many years to come. We are looking forward to working with you, as our passion is helping you to grow your business.

Who are We

Our Awesome Team

Three brothers are building SportKeeper to better serve extreme sports facilities in their member management needs. And yes, our mother purposely gave us all names that start with a "J".

Jeremiah

The man, the myth, the legend... Jerem has done it all. As our head of customer support and marketing, Jerem ensures that everything we do meets the needs of our customers. He also does a pretty good job at climbing rocks.

  • Head of Customer Experience

  • Lover of Outside

Jadyn

The most caring man we know, Jadyn has a heart of gold and works to make sure that our tool will actually meet your needs. He also has an amazing sense of humor and likes short walks in the dirt.

  • Head of Business Development

  • Explorer of Nature

Justin

As an experienced product manager, Justin makes sure that our tools are working and our books are in shape. He also likes to explore the world with his girls.

  • Head of Finance and IT

  • Family Man
